title: What do you think about league and its future ?
body: Because  RITO admit it...You can't say it and you probably won't but it feels like League is losing players...Remember you make a huge income out of pros and all the events, new people investing in E.Sports... but what about all the people who who made this BOOM possible the one who use to spend money in League in a daily basis  ...I don't know if you have a record about that...If you have it you can see I was one of them but not anymore...In just a few words I think League is falling . What do you think maybe i might be wrong . (Sorry if I have mistakes im learning English )
